education.description: Completed 10th grade at Govt. High School, Karkaur, covering core subjects like Mathematics, Science, and Social Studies.
Completed 12th grade at Govt. Sr. Sec. School, Dera Bassi, focusing on Arts subjects like History, Political Science, and Economics.
Completed a one-year diploma in computer applications, covering MS Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel), Terminal operations, and FoxPro database management.
Studied at Punjabi University, Patiala, focusing on programming fundamentals, database management, computer networks, and Management Information Systems (MIS).
Completed an internship in React.js at Sunfocus Solutions, gaining hands-on experience in frontend development, component-based architecture, and state management.
